brief: Norway dominates Olympic biathlon mixed relay as Boe and Roeiseland chase gold.
Klaebo wins second gold at Milano-Cortina. Johaug starts as 10km favorite Wednesday.
Liverpool visit Sunderland in crucial title race clash. Arsenal top the table.

radar: Hovland tees off Thursday at Pebble Beach with strong PGA form heading into coastal pro-am.
Ruud's ATP schedule awaits confirmation as tennis season builds toward clay swing. Carlsen eyes next classical tournament after recent rapid success.
